reviews.review_msg: She is very nice and helpful. Will improve your mark if u go see her. Also she is quite HOT!!!

Avoid this class, unless its required.This TA has her own rigid way of marking assignments, and is not open to other ways of writing that students experience in other disciplines. Marks harder than a prof in a 4th year class. Takes an unreasonable amount of time to give back assignments/papers. Worst 1st yr course ever. AVOID HER AT ALL COSTS!!

Is helpful when you ask for it.Online class format was extremely confusing,she did not help make it any clearer.Marking is fair-hard,especially for a 1st yr course.Her expectations are sometimes different than what is posted on outline for paper.Takes forever to post marks,a little faster for papers.Overall,would not recommend.
The class can be confusing if you do not read the assignment info and make sure you stay on top of the readings. Rishma is a very nice TA and helps a lot if you ask her. It is an okay course overall.

rishma takes a very long time to finish marking and posting marks for assignments. this can leave you wondering where you stand in the course when it's finals season. she's an ok TA though, not easy and not hard. course itself was not clear on what was expected. all in all, it was an ok course. i wouldn't recommend taking it though. it's boring
